title: cmd/gc: spurious 'const initializer is not constant' error
body:
You get the idea.

pkg/os/file.go:61: undefined: syscall.O_APPEND
pkg/os/file.go:61: const initializer syscall.O_APPEND is not a constant
pkg/os/file.go:62: undefined: syscall.O_CREAT
pkg/os/file.go:62: const initializer syscall.O_CREAT is not a constant
pkg/os/file.go:63: undefined: syscall.O_EXCL
pkg/os/file.go:63: const initializer syscall.O_EXCL is not a constant
pkg/os/file.go:64: undefined: syscall.O_SYNC
pkg/os/file.go:64: const initializer syscall.O_SYNC is not a constant
pkg/os/file.go:65: undefined: syscall.O_TRUNC
pkg/os/file.go:65: const initializer syscall.O_TRUNC is not a constant
